name: All Is Merry & Bright
description: "All Is Merry and Bright" a simple embroidery pattern.

name: Starry Night Holy Night
description: "Starry Night Holy Night" a simple wool and cotton embroidery pattern.

name: In All Things Give Thanks
description: A simple 4" x 4" embroidery pattern.  "In All Things Give Thanks"

name: Happiness is Making Friends Wool
description: A cotton and wool applique pattern of two friends in the snow.  A super sweet and easy gift to give this holiday season.

name: O Christmas Tree
description: A wool and embroidery pattern embellished with buttons.

name: Hark The Angels Sing
description: "Hark The Herald Angels Sing" a simple embroidery pillow pattern.  This sampler can also be framed.

name: Tis The Season For Snowflakes
description: A wool and cotton applique embroidery pattern.

name: Happiness is Making Friends
description: "Happiness is Making Friends" is a simple embroidery pattern reminding us of our dear friends at the holiday season.

name: Cold Twigs Warm Hearts
description: "Cold Twigs Warm Hearts" a simple simple embroidery pattern.

name: O Christmas Tree - Primitive
description: "O Christmas Tree" a primitive embroidery pattern that is embellished with button "ornaments".

name: Merry Christmas
description: A wool or cotton embroidery pattern that is embellished with your favorite trims and buttons.

name: Mittens Mittens
description: "Mittens Mittens everywhere..always one, never a pair" a wool embroidery pattern, perfect for any mud-room.

name: Wise Men Seek Him Still
description: "Wise Men Seek Him Still" a simple embroidery pattern.

name: Ho Ho Ho
description: A wool applique embroidery pattern that is super easy and festive!

name: Run Run As Fast As You Can
description: "Run Run As Fast As You Can...You Can't Catch Me I'm The Gingerbread Man"  a simple embroidery pattern embellished with large ric rack trim and wool.

name: He'll Fill Your Stockings
description: "He'll fill your stockings to the brim if you hang them out for him"  a wool stocking pattern.

name: I Believe in Snow Angels
description: "I Believe in Snow Angels" is a simple primitive embroidery pattern that is perfect from first snow to last storm.

name: Little Miracles
description: Each snowflake is a unique little miracle and this simple embroidery pattern is embellished with your own collection of white buttons, making each sample unique.

name: Dear Santa
description: A simple embroidery pattern that expresses a child's love for Santa.

name: Tis The Season For Snowflakes - Cotton
description: "Tis the Season for Snowflakes" a simple primitive cotton embroidery pattern.

name: There's No Place Like Gnome
description: "There's No Place Like Gnome for the Holidays" a simple embroidery pattern.

name: Joy to the World
description: "Joy to the World" a pieced embroidery pillow pattern.

name: Sunshine and Smiles
description: "Sunshine and Smiles to While Away the Hours"  a simple cotton applique embroidery pattern.

name: Meet Me In The Garden
description: "Meet Me In The Garden" a cotton applique pattern with a curly button caterpillar!

name: Do One Thing Each Day
description: "Do One Thing Each Day That Makes You Giggle" a simple embroidery pattern.

name: No Empty Chairs
description: "No empty chairs" a simple primitive embroidery pattern.

name: Children Are A Blessing
description: "Children Are a Blessing, Our Dreams Have Come True...Our Lives Have Been Blessed With Each One Of You."  A simple embroidery pattern with sketch drawing for each family member.

name: Be Still
description: "Be still as God whispers and the world becomes more loud." A simple primitive embroidery pattern.

name: Love Grows
description: "Love Grows" a simple cotton applique embroidery pattern.

name: Flowers Small Flowers Tall
description: "Flowers small...Flowers tall popping up between my toes" a simple embroidery pattern embellished with yo-yo flowers and ric-rack dirt.

name: Happiness is Like Spreading Jam
description: "Happiness is like spreading jam...you can't share a little without getting some on yourself"  A simple embroidery applique pattern.

name: Counting Pumpkins
description: "She counted her pumpkins and whistled a tune on an October night when she rode on the moon."  A cotton and wool embroidery pattern.

name: Angels From Above
description: "Angels from above shower my garden with their love" a primitive embroidery pattern that is embellished with "button flowers".

name: It Takes Each of Us
description: "It takes each of us to make the difference for all of us"  a simple embroidery pattern embellished with cotton rolled flowers.

name: Scatter Seeds of Kindness
description: "Scatter seeds of kindness all along as you go...trust the harvest giver...He will make each seed to grow."  A beautiful detailed floral embroidery pattern.

name: Our Family Is Like A Quilt
description: "Our family is like a quilt.  Sometimes they become worn and unravelled, but they can always be stitched back together with love."  A pieced embroidery pattern.

name: His Wings
description: "He shall cover you with His feathers and under His wing shalt thou trust"  A simple cotton applique embroidery pattern.

name: Celebrate Dream Create
description: "Celebrate Dream Create...Live Laugh Love" a cotton applique embroidery pattern.

name: Keep Your Face To The Sun
description: "Keep your face to the sun and you won't see the shadows."  A simple embroidery pattern embellished with wool flowers and buttons.

name: Ring Around The Rosies
description: "Ring around the rosies" a simple and funky embroidery pattern.

name: Our Family Is A Circle
description: "Our family is a circle of strength.  With every birth and every union the circle grows.  Every joy shared adds more love.  Every crisis shared makes the circle grow stronger."  A simple primitive embroidery pattern.

name: A Weed Is A Flower
description: "A weed is just a flower in disguise"  a primitive embroidery pattern embellished with lace flowers.

name: Pleasant Words
description: "Pleasant Words are as Honey to the Soul" a primitive embroidery pattern.

name: Counting Chickens
description: "Faith is Counting Chickens"  a wool or cotton applique embroidery pattern.

name: Sometimes the Smallest Things
description: "Sometimes the Smallest Things Take Up The Most Room in your Heart" a simple embroidery pattern.

name: Love Isn't Something You Fall Into
description: "Love isn't something that you fall into, it's something you grow forever."  A simple embroidery cotton applique pattern.

name: Paper Hearts
description: "I'm going to make a heart of paper and put it together with glue...Valentine's Day is giving me a sweet day to say I love you"

name: Share Your Heart
description: "Share your heart to your heart's content"...a sweet Valentine's Day pattern!

name: Sweet Valentine Trio
description: A trio of three mini-Valentine embroidery patterns.

name: Hippity Hoppity
description: "Hippity Hoppity Easter's on it's Way"  A primitive embroidery pattern.

name: Summer Wool Sampler
description: "Summer" wool mini-sampler pattern.

name: Spring Wool Sampler
description: "Spring" wool mini sampler pattern.

name: Irish Blessing
description: "May God give you for every storm a rainbow.  For every tear a smile. For every care a promise and a blessing in each trial.  For every problem life sends, a faithful friend to share.  For every sigh a sweet song and an answer for each prayer."  A simple applique embroidery pattern.

name: Luck of the Irish
description: "Where ever you go and what ever you do...may the luck of the Irish be there with you."  An Irish embroidery sampler.

name: Hisk and Hark
description: "Hisk and Hark ...fear and tremble...tis the Night that Ghost Assemble"  a wool and cotton applique embroidery pattern.

name: I Am Not Scared
description: "I Am Not Scared...There is no need...He's nothing but a grown-up pumpkin seed"  a primitive embroidery pattern.

name: Boo to You
description: "Boo to You" wool applique pattern.

name: Tomorrow's Harvest
description: "We plant today the seeds of tomorrow's harvest."  A primitive embroidery pattern embellished with pumpkin buttons.

name: Laughing Pumpkins
description: "Laughing Pumpkins everywhere...tis the whisper of fall in the air."  A primitive spooky embroidery pattern.

name: We Gather Together
description: "We Gather Together to Ask The Lord's Blessing" a simple primitive embroidery pillow pattern.

name: The Littlest Pumpkins
description: "The littlest pumpkins have the sweetest grins"  a primitive embroidery pattern.

name: My Pumpkin Angel
description: "My Pumpkin Angel" a primitive darling little pumpkin angel embroidery pattern.
